attributes.action: reject planning permission to the company wanting to build a wavecentre on the retallack park site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a company is planning to build a wavecentre on the retallack park site (spirit of the west american theme park and westworld raceway).as most people know westworld is highly supported and would be a great loss so please save our track

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
